src:
Imigrasi Takengon Proses WNA ke Rumah Detensi Imigrasi Medan
04 Nov 2019, 19:03 by Satiran


Imigrasi Takengon Proses WNA ke Rumah Detensi Imigrasi Medan

KBRN, Takengon: Warga Negara Asing (WNA) yang diciduk Imigrasi Kelas III Non TPI Takengon dan tim Kanwil Kemenkumham Aceh saat ini sedang dalam proses pemulangan ke rumah Detensi Imigrasi Medan.
Kepala Kantor Imigrasi Kelas III Non TPI Takengon , Fachruddin Romi Noviar Saputra kepada RRI menyampaikan, selama diamankan, WNA yang diduga dari Negara Bangladesh inisial MB itu ditempatkan di ruang Detensi Imigrasi Takengon.
“Ini enggak kita tahan. Ini di ruang Detensi Imigrasi. Nah di ruang itu kita lakukan penyelidikan lebih lanjut guna memperoleh keterangan. Subjek dari satu pengungsi, jadi kita proses kita tempatkan di Medan, di rumah Detensi di Medan, di Belawan,” ujar Kepala Kantor Imigrasi Kelas III Non TPI Takengon , Fachruddin Romi Noviar Saputra kepada RRI, Senin (4/11/2019)
WNA tersebut sebelumnya diciduk petugas Imigrasi Kelas III Non TPI Takengon dan tim Kanwil Kemenkumham Aceh di Blangkolak II dari hasil laporan masyarakat setempat.
Setelah dilakukan pengecekan, MB tidak memiliki kelengkapan administrasi sebagai seorang WNA, sehingga diamankan selama lebih dari 1x24 jam di Imigrasi Takengon.
text:
Takengon Immigration Process WNA to Medan Immigration Detention House
Nov 04 2019, 19:03 by Satiran


Takengon Immigration Process WNA to Medan Immigration Detention House

KBRN, Takengon: Foreign Citizens (WNA) arrested by Class III Non-TPI Takengon Immigration and the Aceh Kankumham Regional Office team are currently in the process of returning to the Medan Immigration Detention house.
The Head of the Takengon Class III Immigration Office, Takachon, Fachruddin Romi Noviar Saputra told RRI that during his safekeeping, the foreigner who was suspected of being from the Bangladesh State of MB was placed in the Takengon Immigration Detention Room.
"We can't stand it. This is the Immigration Detention Room. Now in that space we do further investigation in order to obtain information. The subject of one refugee, so we process it we place it in Medan, at the Detention house in Medan, in Belawan, "said the Head of the Takengon Non-TPI Class III Immigration Office, Fachruddin Romi Noviar Saputra to RRI, Monday (11/04/2019)
The foreigner was previously arrested by the Takengon Class III Immigration officer Takengon and the Aceh Kemenkumham Regional Office team in Blangkolak II from the results of local community reports.
After checking, MB does not have complete administration as a foreigner, so it is safeguarded for more than 1x24 hours at Takengon Immigration.
